meta.title: An Overview of the Bote Region

nodes.body: The Bote are an ethnic group of Nepal who speak an Indo-European language of the same name. According to the 2001 census of Nepal, 2,823 people speak Bote as a mother tongue and there are 7,969 ethnic Bote. (Mark Turin â€“ June 01, 2004)
nodes.title: An Overview of the Bote Region
